meanings.definition: A design or picture that is transferred onto a surface
meanings.sent1: I put a decal of a flower on my notebook.
meanings.sent2: The decal of a unicorn brightened up the plain wall.
meanings.sent3: The decal of a cat on the ceiling made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a decal, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The decal of the sunset was so realistic, it felt like you could step into it.

meanings.sent1: She added a decal of a star to her laptop.
meanings.sent2: The decal on the car window showed a cute cartoon character.
meanings.sent3: The decal on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a bright decal on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The decal on the door was so eye-catching, everyone noticed it immediately.
